Class Gui

  • java.lang.Object
    • Gui
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoardListener, GameListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class Gui
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameListener, BoardListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener
    The Class Gui. The main view of the game, connects all the panels together providing a graphical means to play the game.
